00125 #define arg_GETATTR4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opgetattr
00126 #define res_GETATTR4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opgetattr
00127 #define res_FATTR4  res_GETATTR4.GETATTR4res_u.resok4.obj_attributes 
00128  
00129 
00143 int nfs4_op_getattr(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00144                       compound_data_t   * data,
00145                       struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00146 {
00147   uint64_t  attr_supp = 0 ;
00148 
00149   int cpt = 0 ;
00150   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr ;
00151   cache_inode_status_t cache_status ;
00152   
00153   char funcname[] = "nfs4_op_getattr" ;
00154 
00155   /* This is a NFS4_OP_GETTAR */
00156   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_GETATTR ;
00157 
00158   /* If there is no FH */
00159   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00160     {
00161       res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00162       return NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00163     }
00164   
00165   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00166   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00167     {
00168       res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00169       return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00170     }
00171   
00172   /* Tests if teh Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00173   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00174     {
00175       res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00176       return NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00177     }
00178 
00179   /* Pseudo Fs management */
00180   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00181     return nfs4_op_getattr_pseudo( op, data, resp ) ;
00182 
00183 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00184   printf( "CURRENT FH: NFS4_OP_GETATTR = { Length = %d  Val = ", data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len) ;
00185   for( cpt = 0 ; cpt < data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len ; cpt ++ )
00186     printf( "%02X", data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val[cpt] );
00187   printf( " } \n" ) ;
00188 #endif
00189 
00190   /* Sanity check: if no attributes are wanted, nothing is to be done.
00191    * In this case NFS4_OK is to be returned */
00192   if( arg_GETATTR4.attr_request.bitmap4_len == 0 )
00193     {
00194       res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00195       return res_GETATTR4.status ;
00196     }
00197 
00198   /* Get only attributes that are allowed to be read */
00199   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access_Bitmap( &arg_GETATTR4.attr_request, FATTR4_ATTR_READ ) )
00200     {
00201       res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00202       return res_GETATTR4.status ;
00203     }
00204 
00205   /* Ask only for supported attributes */
00206   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported_Bitmap( &arg_GETATTR4.attr_request ) )
00207     {
00208        res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00209        return res_GETATTR4.status ;
00210     }
00211   
00212   /*
00213    * Get attributes.
00214    */
00215   if( cache_inode_getattr( data->current_entry, 
00216                            &attr, 
00217                            data->ht,
00218                            data->pclient, 
00219                            data->pcontext, 
00220                            &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00221     {
00222       if( nfs4_FSALattr_To_Fattr( data->pexport,
00223                                   &attr,
00224                                   &(res_GETATTR4.GETATTR4res_u.resok4.obj_attributes), 
00225                                   data, 
00226                                   &(data->currentFH),
00227                                   &(arg_GETATTR4.attr_request) ) != 0 )
00228         res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00229       else
00230         res_GETATTR4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00231       
00232       return res_GETATTR4.status ;
00233     }
00234   res_GETATTR4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00235   
00236   return res_GETATTR4.status ;
00237 } /* nfs4_op_getattr */
00238 
00239 
00250 void nfs4_op_getattr_Free( GETATTR4res * resp )
00251 { 
00252   if( resp->status == NFS4_OK )
00253     {
00254       Mem_Free( (char *)resp->GETATTR4res_u.resok4.obj_attributes.attrmask.bitmap4_val ) ;
00255       Mem_Free( (char *)resp->GETATTR4res_u.resok4.obj_attributes.attr_vals.attrlist4_val ) ;
00256     }
00257   return ;
00258 } /* nfs4_op_getattr_Free */
